member.name: IShellLinkDataList.AddDataBlock
member.summary: Adds a data block to a link.
member.param: The data block structure. For a list of supported structures, see .
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM error code otherwise.

member.name: IShellLinkDataList.CopyDataBlock
member.summary: Retrieves a copy of a link's data block.
member.param: The data block's signature. The signature value for a particular type of data block can be found in its structure reference. For a list of supported data block types and their associated structures, see .

The address of a pointer to a copy of the data block structure. If IShellLinkDataList.CopyDataBlock returns a successful result, the calling application must free the memory when it is no longer needed by calling .
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM error code otherwise.

member.name: IShellLinkDataList.GetFlags
member.param: Pointer to one or more of the that indicate the current option settings.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLinkDataList.RemoveDataBlock
member.summary: Removes a data block from a link.
member.param: The data block's signature. The signature value for a particular type of data block can be found in its structure reference. For a list of supported data block types and their associated structures, see .
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM error code otherwise.

member.name: IShellLinkDataList.SetFlags
member.param: One or more of the that indicate the option settings.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLinkDataList
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow an application to attach extra data blocks to a Shell link. These methods add, copy, or remove data blocks.
